attributes.action: readdress the injustices of the 1994 pay review for Police Officers, and reinstate housing allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are thousands of officers across the country putting their lives on the line every day, some of whom are getting up to £450.00 less per month that the officer sat next to them. Many of these officer cannot afford to buy a home and struggle with debts and basic living costs each month. Please help them to protect you. Ask the PM to reinstate or redress these huge unnecessary pay differences.
